snippet: One of the warmest, most pleasant bridge players, Lea du Pont of Rockland, Del., died last Friday of emphysema.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played on Bridge Base Online by Lea du Pont, who recently died.
lead_paragraph: One of the warmest, most pleasant bridge players, Lea du Pont of Rockland, Del., died last Friday of emphysema.

headline.seo: Bridge — Memorable Play by the Champion Lea du Pont
headline.main: Memorable Play by the Champion Lea du Pont
